query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: main.status=1 and main.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.senddeptid in (@revDeptId@) and main.senddeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct main.id,main.sheetid,main.title,main.sendtime,main.senddeptid from itsoftchange_main main where main.status=1 and main.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.senddeptid='@s1@' order by main.sendtime desc

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: main.status=1 and main.mainrejecttimes>0 and main.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.senddeptid in (@revDeptId@) and main.senddeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct main.id,main.sheetid,main.title,main.sendtime,main.senddeptid from itsoftchange_main main where main.status=1 and main.mainrejecttimes>0 and main.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.senddeptid='@s1@' order by main.sendtime desc

query-define.name: query3
query-define.where: main.status=1 and (main.mainrejecttimes is null or main.mainrejecttimes=0) and main.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.senddeptid in (@revDeptId@) and main.senddeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct main.id,main.sheetid,main.title,main.sendtime,main.senddeptid from itsoftchange_main main where main.status=1 and (main.mainrejecttimes is null or main.mainrejecttimes=0) and main.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.senddeptid='@s1@' order by main.sendtime desc

query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: main.status=1 and main.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.mainnetsystem in (@mainnetsystem@) and main.mainnetsystem is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct main.id,main.sheetid,main.title,main.sendtime,main.mainnetsystem from itsoftchange_main main where main.status=1 and main.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.mainnetsystem='@s1@' order by main.sendtime desc

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: main.status=1 and main.mainrejecttimes>0 and main.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.mainnetsystem in (@mainnetsystem@) and main.mainnetsystem is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct main.id,main.sheetid,main.title,main.sendtime,main.mainnetsystem from itsoftchange_main main where main.status=1 and main.mainrejecttimes>0 and main.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.mainnetsystem='@s1@' order by main.sendtime desc

query-define.name: query3
query-define.where: main.status=1 and (main.mainrejecttimes is null or main.mainrejecttimes=0) and main.sendtime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.main.mainnetsystem in (@mainnetsystem@) and main.main.mainnetsystem is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct main.id,main.sheetid,main.title,main.sendtime,main.mainnetsystem from itsoftchange_main main where main.status=1 and (main.mainrejecttimes is null or main.mainrejecttimes=0) and main.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and main.mainnetsystem='@s1@' order by main.sendtime desc
